data-structure.description: Structure of data the tool can read and process.
data-structure.label: Data Structure

multipoints.label: MultiPoint
multipoints.description: Able to handle multi point locations

multilines.label: MultiLines
multilines.description: This field means this and that

polygon.label: Polygon
polygon.description: This field means this and that

multipolygon.label: MultiPolygon
multipolygon.description: This field means this and that

collection.label: Collection
collection.description: Able to handle collections of geo features.

geocoder.label: Geocoder
geocoder.description: A gazeteer to lookup and/or convert adresses to geo coordinates.

distance.label: Distance
distance.description: Enables to calculate (an approximation) of the distance between two locations.

contains.description: Enables to check whether a location is within an area.

csv.label: CSV
csv.description: Able to handle CSV (Comma Separated Values) files.

kml.label: KML
kml.description: Able to handle KML (Keyhole Markup Language) files.

gml.label: GML
gml.description: Able to handle GML (Geography Markup Language) files.

gpx.label: GPX
gpx.description: Able to handle GPX (GPS Exchange Format) files.

geotiff.label: GeoTIFF
geotiff.description: Able to handle GeoTIFF files (images with geo metadata).

postgis.label: PostGIS
postgis.description: Able to query and parse a PostGIS database.

mbtiles.description: Able to read and show map tiles for a MBTiles file.

visualization.label: Visualizations
visualization.description: Various types of supported data visualizations.

image.label: Image
image.description: Able to handle an image as base map.

tiles.label: Tiles
tiles.description: Able to handle map tiles as base map.

vector.label: Vector
vector.description: Able to handle vector data or vector tiles as base map.

simple.label: Simple
simple.description: Provides out-of-the-box markers for all supported types.

complex.label: Complex
complex.description: Provides means to create complex markers, e.g. to show data based glyphs at a location.

connections.description: Provides means to show connections between markers.

connections-attr.description: Enables to map data attributes to visual properties of the connections.

connections-weight.description: Enables to visualize varying connection weights.

choropleth.label: Choropleth
choropleth.description: Enables to map data attributes to visual properties of polygons.
